actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution directing the Committee on the Judiciary to investigate whether there are grounds for the impeachment of Richard M. Nixon.

summary.text: Directs the Committee on the Judiciary to investigate whether there are grounds for the impeachment of Richard M. Nixon, and to report as soon as practicable its findings to the House with such resolutions or articles of impeachment deemed appropriate.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Committee on the Judiciary to investigate whether there are grounds for the impeachment of Richard M. Nixon.
